xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/311267-Be Pretty and Shut Up! 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/uD9dt04eDSkaddy4hCh45ph6ZjS.jpg The film is a series of interviews with various well-known film actresses, including Jenny Agutter, Maria Schneider, and Jane Fonda. The title, which is borrowed from a 1958 film with the same name by Marc Allegret, refers to the sense the actresses have of what is expected of them by the film industry. Be Pretty and Shut Up!
